description: Take your review management to the next level with analytics, automation, API access, and custom integrations.

key_features.title: Advanced Analytics Dashboard
key_features.description: Deep insights into review performance, customer sentiment, response rates, and platform distribution with exportable reports.

key_features.title: Automated Campaigns
key_features.description: Set up scheduled review request campaigns based on triggers like service completion or time intervals.

key_features.title: REST API Access
key_features.description: Full API access for custom integrations with your existing tools and workflows, including prompt page management.

key_features.title: Real-Time Webhooks
key_features.description: Get instant notifications when important events occur - new reviews, responses, contacts added, and campaigns completed.

key_features.title: AI-Powered Optimization
key_features.description: Let AI analyze your data to optimize request timing, messaging, and customer targeting for maximum response rates.

key_features.title: White Label & Custom Domains
key_features.description: Use your own domain for prompt pages and widgets, plus remove Prompt Reviews branding on premium plans.

how_it_works.title: Access Advanced Tools
how_it_works.description: Upgrade to Builder or Maven plans to unlock analytics, automation, and API access.

how_it_works.title: Set Up Automation
how_it_works.description: Create automated workflows and campaigns based on customer behavior and business triggers.

how_it_works.title: Integrate Your Systems
how_it_works.description: Use our REST API and webhooks to connect Prompt Reviews with your existing business tools.

how_it_works.title: Analyze and Optimize
how_it_works.description: Use advanced analytics to understand performance and let AI optimize your review collection strategy.

best_practices.title: Start with Analytics
best_practices.description: Before automating, understand your current performance. Use analytics to identify which prompt pages and strategies work best for your business.

best_practices.title: Automate Gradually
best_practices.description: Begin with simple automation like scheduled follow-ups, then expand to complex workflows as you learn what works for your customers.

best_practices.title: Monitor API Usage
best_practices.description: Keep track of your API rate limits and webhook reliability. Set up proper error handling and monitoring for production integrations.

best_practices.title: Leverage White Labeling
best_practices.description: For agencies and enterprise users, white labeling creates a seamless brand experience that builds trust with your customers.
